Conclusion/Reference

Overall, I really felt that I learned a lot more. I was able to debug my code more easily than before, and I can send my data over bluetooth and create plots in jupyter notebook. I also learned how to solder which I never knew how to do before. Finally, it has also shown me that robots have limited perception, and that their sensors are not always accurate and reliable and can vary through factors not forseen. References:

I refernced Stephan and Mikayla's lab 3, and I also used ChatGPT to also help me debug when I wasn't sure and teach me how to read binary and then turn it back to HEX!
